info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 4:12PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Weld and northern Logan Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 411 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Colton to 6 miles west of Grover, or along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Sidney to 30 miles southeast of Cheyenne. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Peetz, Grover, Padroni, Westplains, Hereford, North Sterling Reservoir and Pawnee Buttes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
